text: Rein Ratas (born 9 May 1938) is an Estonian politician, representing the Estonian Centre Party. Ratas served in the Riigikogu 2007–2011 and again 2015–2018. Due to a lengthy illness, Ratas was substituted by Igor Kravtšenko from December 2016 until September 2018, when Ratas formally left his seat for Kravtšenko. Ratas is the father of Estonian Prime Minister Jüri Ratas. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:21st-century Estonian politicians Category:Estonian Centre Party politicians Category:Living people Category:Members of the Riigikogu, 2007–2011 Category:Members of the Riigikogu, 2015–2019 Category:People from Häädemeeste Parish
title: Rein Ratas
